--------------------
Text: The council of Nine Men was a citizens board and a form of representational democracy in New Netherland.

Triplets:<The council of Nine Men
1:
--------------------
Text: Nine Men:  It replaced the previous councils, the Twelve Men and the Eight Men.
Triplets:<Nine Men
2:
--------------------
Text: Nine Men:  Members of the council were elected in 1647, 1649, 1650 and 1652.
Triplets:<Members of the council
4:
--------------------
<Text: Nine Men:  It became the basis for the municipal government when the city of New Amsterdam received its charter in 1653.>
